div.span: School Building Closure in effect for the remainder of the school year| 2020-2021 Registration is now open!

span.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; background-color: #ffffff;font-size:14px

strong.span: 2020-2021 Registration is now open! Click here to register

div.span: Welcome to another new school year. The 2019-2020 school year promises to be a great one. I would like to take this opportunity to say I am honored and very excited to be your Superintendent. -Rachael Smith

YCS Literacy Nights are a huge success. Students, families and community partners come for a night of reading and activities. All are encouraged to come and enjoy an evening with our families and staff.
YCS's outlook to learning allows students to actively engage themselves through our multifaceted approach in the classroom.
Our 7th-8th grade basketball team had a terrific season. They finished the year 6-6 and won their first playoff game. Thank you to Coach Brenda for a terrific season.

Why I love Youngstown Community School. My grandchildren have attended there for 3 years. They are like family and are always willing to help me. I am grateful for them and their willingness to keep improving the children's education. - YCS Grandparent

YCS is a wonderful place for children to attend. The staff really goes above and beyond for the children. This allows children to grow and learn in a great environment with people who really care about them. Also, programs such as Success After Six, allows for children to receive even more attention in problem areas to ensure when report cards come out, they have brought grades up. Wonderful place!! - Rosa Bowers, parent of eighth grade student Anthony Thomas
